summary.intent: Redesign the Action Summary in the remediation history card from a flat alphabetical file list into a 3-column table layout grouped by artifact type (Rules, Skills, Context Files, Other) with prominent section headers.
summary.outcome: Successfully implemented the redesign with new CSS classes, categorization logic, and rewritten UnifiedFilesSection/UnifiedFileRow components. All 1319 tests passed, CSS rebuilt, lint fixed and passing, committed as 11469d4.

repo: Uses bun as the primary package manager and task runner; `bun run test` runs 1319 tests
CSS must be explicitly rebuilt after changes: `cd frontend && bun run css:build`
Pre-commit hooks automatically run tests, lint, and typecheck on commit
A `codex-provider.ts` had unrelated in-progress changes present in the working tree during this session
The `rtk` prefix works for git commands but not for bun task runner commands

code.finding: New categorization logic insertion point: SectionType, categorizeEntry, groupEntriesBySections, SectionIcon added above component functions
UnifiedFilesSection rewritten to render grouped sections with prominent headers (icon + label + file count) instead of flat entries.map()
UnifiedFileRow converted from vertical layout to 3-column CSS grid: file path | issues fixed (with ✓ prefix) | status badge + line counts
7 new action-summary-* CSS classes added near change-badge-* classes: section-header, section-title, section-count, row (grid-template-columns: 2fr 3fr auto), cell-file, cell-description, cell-badge
RemediationAction type defines outputType field used for primary categorization; path-based heuristics serve as fallback for unmatched entries

workflow: Run `bun run lint:fix` before manually diagnosing lint errors — auto-fix resolves formatting issues instantly
When committing, explicitly stage only the files relevant to the task to avoid accidentally committing unrelated in-progress work
CSS rebuild is a separate step from lint/test and must be run explicitly after any Tailwind class additions

friction: `rtk bun run test` failed silently (rtk prefix incompatible with bun task runner); had to retry as bare `bun run test`
Lint failed after initial implementation, requiring a separate `bun run lint:fix` pass before lint could be verified clean
open_items: Uncommitted changes to `codex-provider.ts` were intentionally left unstaged — unrelated work in progress that needs its own commit
